# Marketing Boutique - GTM Engineering Agency

## About
Marketing Boutique is a GTM Engineering agency serving B2B SaaS startups.
We specialize in outbound automation, ABM campaigns, and AI search optimization.

## Services
- GTM Engineering: Outbound automation, Clay implementation, sales workflows
- ABM Campaigns: 1:1, 1:Few, 1:Many account-based marketing
- SEO & AEO: Traditional SEO + Answer Engine Optimization
- Paid Ads: LinkedIn, Google, Meta, Reddit advertising

## Key Resources
/blog/what-is-gtm-engineering/ - Complete guide to GTM Engineering
/blog/answer-engine-optimization/ - AEO definitive guide
/services/gtm-engineering/ - Our GTM services
